name: Motorcycle Stunt Race 3D
description:
Every sport has its own fans – somebody loves sport car racing, and somebody prefers monster trucks off road race. There are a lot of different racing types, and today we invite you to a fantastic moto bike trial! Extreme tracks with springboards and platforms are waiting for you. Navigate your bike through different obstacles and challenge your driving skills. Motorcycle Stunt Race 3D will steal your heart with no doubt!

You can perform different tricks and score points. Jump over abysses, use springboards, avoid obstacles, try not to crash. Good luck!

Motorcycle Stunt Race 3D game features:
• Real motorcycle ride 3D;
• Specially prepared racing tracks;
• Stunt bike racing challenge – try different tricks;
• Extreme driving simulator.

Saddle your bike and drive fast! Raise extreme speed and jump high in Motorcycle Stunt Race 3D game!
